availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John Stewart McFarlane Dickinson (Clay County Kentucky Judge)

body.p: Clay County, Kentucky, Judge. Native of Tazewell, Tennessee. Married Mary Elizabeth Burchell Dickinson. Lawyer in Manchester, Kentucky.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Clay County, District 1, p. 23.
Find A Grave, "John Stewart McFarlane Dickinson (1824-1903)," Memorial #132771650, http://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=132771650 (accessed May, 22, 2017).
